categorization_prompt: Categorize the email into exactly one of: Important, Newsletter, Spam, To-Do. Return only the category name.
action_item_prompt: Extract action items from the email. Respond in JSON array form: [{"task": "...", "deadline": "..."}]. If none, return an empty array [].
auto_reply_prompt: Write an email draft reply in a professional friendly tone. Include subject and body separated by '---SUBJECT---' and '---BODY---'. If it's a meeting request, ask for agenda politely. Keep the reply concise (<= 200 words).
